glsa.title: Tablib: Arbitrary command execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Tablib might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary python commands.

background.p: Tablib is an MIT Licensed format-agnostic tabular dataset library, written in Python. It allows you to import, export, and manipulate tabular data sets.

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in Tablibâ€™s Databook loading functionality, due to improper input validation.

impact.p: A remote attacker, by enticing the user to process a specially crafted Databook via YAML, could possibly execute arbitrary python commands with the privilege of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
